Title: [Focus Keyword] - [Brief Description]


[PROMPT] Write an article on [Focus Keyword]: [Brief explanation or definition of the focus keyword] [TARGETLANGUAGE] and make sure that you don't follow ai pattern but article
should be really simple and it should make sense it should be as written with an intermediate level writer. Make sure to add a bit of humor and add some funny lines. Also add bold and italic
PromptHint: [Focus Keyword]: [Brief explanation or definition of the focus keyword]
